reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 340/01: DESIGNATION - ONTARIO GINSENG GROWERS' ASSOCIATION
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 340/01: DESIGNATION - ONTARIO GINSENG GROWERS' ASSOCIATION
reg_info.act_under: Farm Products Marketing Act   Loi sur la commercialisation des produits agricoles

content.content: 1. (1) In this Regulation, “association” means the Ontario Ginseng Growers’ Association designated in section 2; “ginseng” means the root of the herbaceous perennial known as ginseng.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 1 (1). (2) Nothing in this Regulation applies to wildly-grown ginseng, known as wild ginseng.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) In this Regulation,

“association” means the Ontario Ginseng Growers’ Association designated in section 2;

“ginseng” means the root of the herbaceous perennial known as ginseng.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 1 (1).

(2) Nothing in this Regulation applies to wildly-grown ginseng, known as wild ginseng.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. The Ontario Ginseng Growers’ Association is designated as the representative association of producers of ginseng within Ontario for the carrying out of a program for stimulating, increasing and improving the producing and marketing locally within Ontario of ginseng by advertising, education, research and other means.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The Ontario Ginseng Growers’ Association is designated as the representative association of producers of ginseng within Ontario for the carrying out of a program for stimulating, increasing and improving the producing and marketing locally within Ontario of ginseng by advertising, education, research and other means.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Every producer who grows one-quarter of an acre or more of ginseng for commercial production shall pay to the association a proratable licence fee of $100 per acre or portion of an acre of ginseng in production.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 3; O. Reg. 424/10, s. 1; O. Reg. 213/14, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 3. Every producer who grows one-quarter of an acre or more of ginseng for commercial production shall pay to the association a proratable licence fee of $100 per acre or portion of an acre of ginseng in production.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 3; O. Reg. 424/10, s. 1; O. Reg. 213/14, s. 1.

content.content: 4. (1) On or before February 1 in each year, every producer shall forward to the association the licence fees required under section 3.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 4 (1). (2) The association may require payment of the licence fees on a prorated basis throughout the year.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 4 (2).
content.raw_html:
4. (1) On or before February 1 in each year, every producer shall forward to the association the licence fees required under section 3.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 4 (1).

(2) The association may require payment of the licence fees on a prorated basis throughout the year.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 4 (2).

content.content: 5. The association is authorized to use the licence fees for the purposes of defraying the expenses of the association in carrying out its objects.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. The association is authorized to use the licence fees for the purposes of defraying the expenses of the association in carrying out its objects.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 5.

content.content: 6. The association shall furnish to the Commission such information and financial statements as the Commission determines.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6. The association shall furnish to the Commission such information and financial statements as the Commission determines.  O. Reg. 340/01, s. 6.
